text: Waterford City was a constituency represented in the Irish House of Commons from 1264 to 1800. Following the Act of Union of 1800 the borough retained one seat. ==Boundaries and Boundary Changes== This constituency was based in the city of Waterford in County Waterford. ==History== It was incorporated by charter in 1264 with freeholders and freemen. ==Members of Parliament== {| class="wikitable" |- !Election!!!!First member!!First party!!!!Second member!!Second party |- |1560||
